passive_skill.name: Super Saiyan 4 Duo
passive_skill.effect: Activates the Entrance Animation upon the character's entry: (Once) Damage reduction rate 77% up and launches an additional Super Attack for 1 turn; (Once) Ki +2, ATK & DEF 100% up and guards all attacks for 7 turns; (Once) ATK & DEF 200% up; (Once) Receives an additional Ki +2 per Type Ki Sphere obtained; For every Ki Sphere obtained: ATK & DEF 10% up (up to 77%); For every Rainbow Ki Sphere obtained: Chance of performing a critical hit 10% up; When attacking with 17 or more Ki: Launches an additional Super Attack; When attacking with 20 or more Ki: Attacks are effective against all Types; Launches an additional Super Attack
